title: Projects
description: These are just some of my favorites. See the rest on my Github.

projects.description: Tired of sifting through Spotify/Apple Music just to find the latest Hip-Hop songs? Rap Hunt gathers the latest releases in the past week and displays their streaming links all in one place.
content: Utilized Reddit API to gather the latest songs from the r/HipHopHeads subreddit.
Parsed post data with RegEx to gather popularity metrics and song information.
Ranked songs based on user sentiment using calculations involving post karma, time, and engagement.

projects.description: Sometimes a note taking app only needs to be simple and easy to use. With no feature creep or steep learning curves, Jot exists to deliver a streamlined and focused note taking experience.
content: Used Draft.js to facilitate rich text editing, including hyperlinks, lists, code blocks, and more.
Leveraged Gorilla sessions for secure session management and PostgreSQL tsvector for full text search.
Hosted dockerized backed with AWS Elastic Beanstalk and automated CI/CD pipelines with Github Actions.
